lndUpgrade.title: LND upgrade
lndUpgrade.subtitle: Check for the latest official LND release and upgrade safely.
lndUpgrade.updateAvailable: A newer LND release is available.
lndUpgrade.upToDate: You are on the latest LND version.
lndUpgrade.warning: Upgrades restart LND. Ensure you have backups and stable power before proceeding.
lndUpgrade.confirmBody: This will download and install {{version}} and restart the LND service.
lndUpgrade.confirmWarning: If LND fails to start, the upgrade is rolled back automatically, but channel and fund safety is your responsibility.
lndUpgrade.rcWarning: Release candidate detected ({{version}}). This is a pre-release build and is not recommended for production.
lndUpgrade.rcConfirmHint: RC upgrades require an extra confirmation.
lndUpgrade.rcConfirmReady: RC confirmation recorded. Click again to start the upgrade.
lndUpgrade.started: Upgrade started. Follow the logs below.
lndUpgrade.logsHint: Logs appear once the upgrade starts.

appUpgrade.title: App upgrade
appUpgrade.subtitle: Check for the latest official app release and upgrade safely.
appUpgrade.updateAvailable: A newer app release is available.
appUpgrade.upToDate: You are on the latest app version.
appUpgrade.warning: Upgrade recompiles manager and UI, then restarts lightningos-manager.
appUpgrade.confirmBody: This will build and install {{version}} and restart lightningos-manager.
appUpgrade.confirmWarning: Keep stable power and avoid interrupting the process.
appUpgrade.started: Upgrade started. Follow the logs below.
appUpgrade.logsHint: Logs appear once the upgrade starts.

lightningOps.torPeerIntervalInvalid: Interval must be between 2 and 168 hours.
lightningOps.chanHealIntervalInvalid: Interval must be a positive number.
lightningOps.signMessageSubtitle: Sign a message with your node key.
lightningOps.autofeeSubtitle: Automatic fee strategy focused on profitability and movement.
lightningOps.autofeeResultsPredictionHoldOrUp: 🔮 forecast: hold or raise (drained and negative margin; protecting rebal ROI).
lightningOps.autofeeResultsPredictionReduce: 🔮 forecast: reduce in the next rounds (liquidity improving and positive margin).
lightningOps.autofeeResultsPredictionStable: 🔮 forecast: stable/uncertain (waiting for liquidity and margin signals).

lightningOps.boostingPeers: Boosting peers (this can take a while)...
lightningOps.inboundFeesNote: Inbound fees are usually negative to attract inbound flow.
lightningOps.minimumFundingNote: Minimum funding is 20000 sats. Opening a channel can take a few blocks.
lightningOps.searchPlaceholder: Search alias, pubkey, or channel point
lightningOps.selectChannelOrAll: Select a channel or apply to all.
lightningOps.setAtLeastOneFee: Set at least one fee value.
lightningOps.subtitle: Manage peers, channels, and routing fees.

lightningOps.inlineFeeEditHint: Press Enter to update this channel. In rate accepts zero or negative ppm.
lightningOps.inboundMustBeNegative: In rate must be zero or a negative ppm value.

lightningOps.batchOpenNoItems: Add at least one peer before batch open.
lightningOps.batchOpenConnectingPeer: Connecting peer before adding to batch...
lightningOps.batchOpenHostRequired: Peer is not connected. Use pubkey@host:port.
lightningOps.batchOpenDuplicatePeer: This peer is already in the batch queue.

rebalanceCenter.title: Rebalance Center
rebalanceCenter.subtitle: Live costs, payback control, and autonomous liquidity recovery.

budgetPaused.budget_insufficient: Auto paused: budget too low for target.

settings.title: Rebalance Settings
settings.subtitle: Auto controls and shared guardrails.
settings.autoOnlyNote: Auto-only: enable auto rebalance, scan interval, daily budget.

settingsHints.autoEnabled: Turns on periodic scans and automatic rebalances.
settingsHints.scanInterval: How often the auto engine scans channels for opportunities.
settingsHints.dailyBudgetPct: Daily spend cap as a % of the last 24h routing revenue.
settingsHints.deadband: Minimum outbound deficit before a channel becomes a target.
settingsHints.sourceMinLocal: Minimum local liquidity (outbound %) required for a channel to act as source.
settingsHints.econRatio: Fraction of outbound fee used as max fee for route finding.
settingsHints.econRatioMaxPpm: Caps the max fee ppm when using econ ratio (0 = no cap).
settingsHints.feeLimitPpm: Overrides econ ratio with a fixed max fee ppm (0 = disabled).
settingsHints.lostProfit: Subtract estimated source channel fees from the max fee budget.
settingsHints.roiMin: Minimum expected ROI (7d revenue / estimated cost) to auto rebalance.
settingsHints.maxAmount: Maximum sats per rebalance attempt. 0 = no cap.
settingsHints.feeSteps: Number of fee limits tried from low to high.
settingsHints.amountProbeSteps: Number of amount probes from large to small per fee step.
settingsHints.failTolerancePpm: Stop probing when amounts differ by this ppm.
settingsHints.attemptTimeout: Maximum time per attempt before moving to the next fee/amount.
settingsHints.amountProbeAdaptive: Caps next attempts based on the last successful amount.
settingsHints.rebalanceTimeout: Maximum runtime per rebalance job (auto or manual).
settingsHints.manualRestartWatch: When manual auto-restart is enabled on a channel, keep monitoring and restart if it falls below target after success.
settingsHints.mcHalfLife: Decay time for mission control failures. Lower values forget failures faster. 0 = leave LND default.
settingsHints.paybackMode: Unlock when routing revenue pays back the rebalance cost.
settingsHints.timeMode: Unlock after N days since last rebalance.
settingsHints.criticalMode: Allow partial release when sources are scarce.
settingsHints.unlockDays: Days before protected liquidity can be reused.
settingsHints.criticalRelease: Percent of protected liquidity released per critical cycle.
settingsHints.criticalMinSources: Minimum eligible sources required to avoid critical mode.
settingsHints.criticalMinAvailable: Minimum total source liquidity required to avoid critical mode.
settingsHints.criticalCycles: Number of consecutive critical scans before releasing.

channelsHints.targetOutbound: Desired outbound liquidity percentage after the rebalance.
channelsHints.saveTarget: Save the target outbound percentage for this channel.
channelsHints.rebalanceIn: Start a rebalance to increase local (outbound) liquidity.
channelsHints.rebalanceRestart: Auto-restart manual rebalances after cooldown until the target is reached.
channelsHints.auto: Allow auto mode to rebalance in this channel.
channelsHints.excludeSource: Never use this channel as a source for rebalances.
